tool.name: covacs_Select_filtration
tool.description: use in case of not enought snp or indels in covacs_snp_indels
tool.command:
##sym link to run GATK
ln -s $input1 input1.vcf &&
##GATK tool call java -jar \$CONDA_PREFIX/../../GenomeAnalysisTK.jar -T SelectVariants -R $ref_file.fields.path -V input1.vcf -selectType $TYPE -o variants_recal.indels.vcf 2>$log && java -jar \$CONDA_PREFIX/../../GenomeAnalysisTK.jar -T VariantFiltration -R $ref_file.fields.path -V variants_recal.indels.vcf --filterExpression "DP<8 || QD < 2.0 || FS > 200.0 || ReadPosRankSum < -20.0" --filterName "filter_LQ_$TYPE" -o variants_recal.filtered.small.panel.region.vcf
2>> $log

validator.message: A built-in reference genome is not available for the build associated with the selected input file

tool.help:
**IMPORTANT** to get the wrapper ready to start the admin user have to download gatk GATK version 3.8 from the broadinstitute site https://software.broadinstitute.org/gatk/download/archive and then move it in the conda_prefix folder, the path of the conda_prefix is written in the galaxy.ini(or .yml) file
**more informations** at https://software.broadinstitute.org/gatk/documentation/tooldocs/3.8-0/org_broadinstitute_gatk_tools_walkers_variantutils_SelectVariants.php , https://software.broadinstitute.org/gatk/documentation/tooldocs/3.8-0/org_broadinstitute_gatk_tools_walkers_filters_VariantFiltration.php
